alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:59AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade and central Pennington Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 1259 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over eastern Rapid City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Bear Country, Hart Ranch and Reptile Gardens. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 56 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
